metadata.title: CVE-2023-39128 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
GNU gdb (GDB) 13.0.50.20220805-git was discovered to contain a stackoverflow via the function ada_decode at /gdb/ada-lang.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39128` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdb-multiarch - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdb-source - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
gdbserver - 8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gdb package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1.1-0ubuntu1+esm1').
